root.name: MLB SlugFest 20-03
root.description: OverviewMLB Slugfest 20-03 is an over-the-top, action sports games from Midway. It does for baseball what the Blitz series does for football and it's a great time. It has all the aspects you would expect from a Midway sports game like turbo, late hits and the occasional groin punch. The game features the usual commentator along with Jim Shorts, alter ego of radio personality Kevin Matthews, who is the color-commentator. The commentary in Slugfest 20-03 is some of best you'll find anywhere and it still holds up to this day. Slugfest 20-03 is a great arcade baseball game and something anyone could pick up and enjoy.
